experiences.title: Network and System Administrator
experiences.subtitle: Ayanwork Technology Solutions Pvt. Ltd
workDescription: Manage cloud infrastructure using Amazon Web Services (AWS) and Google Cloud Platform (GCP), ensuring optimal performance and security.
Implement DevOps principles with tools like Git and Jenkins, creating CI/CD pipelines to accelerate releases, enhance collaboration, and improve software quality.
Oversee domain and SSL certificate management with registrars such as Route 53, GoDaddy, and Namecheap.
Handle asset management, network administration, and user account management to maintain organizational efficiency.

experiences.title: Network Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Decision Machines Pvt. Ltd, Pune
workDescription: Managed data center and branch connectivity, ensuring seamless operations and network reliability.
Relocated the office data center to Yotta Infrastructure, overseeing the colocation process and ensuring smooth server activation.
Handled and optimized various AWS services, enhancing their configurations for improved performance and reliability.

experiences.title: Network Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Computech Engineers, Pune
workDescription: Provided technical support for prestigious institutions, including COEP Pune, IISER Pune, Sadhu Vaswani International School Pune, and NCL Pune.

Managed and maintained Cisco networking equipment, including: 
 Cisco Catalyst 6807 7-slot core switch 
 Cisco Catalyst C6509 and C4506-E switches
Configured and optimized Radware load balancers to ensure reliable network traffic management.
Deployed and maintained Unibox wireless devices, Access Points, Distribution switches, and Access switches, establishing robust wireless networks.
Demonstrated expertise with Cisco 10G and 1G fiber modules, ensuring high-speed data transmission and efficient connectivity.
